channel.title: [742] RuneForbidden | Eco | Bosses | SOF | PK'ing | Lots More! [742]
channel.description:
[center][center] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/vijfp3.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.serverstatuspage.com/status/uptime.php?id=3000[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img][url=http://runeforbidden.tk/]Forums[/url] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img][url=http://runeforbidden.tk/playnow.php]Play Now[/url] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nkrf1.png[/img][url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/98737785/RuneForbidden%20Client.jar]Download Client Here[/url]
[b]WE CURRENTLY ARE NOT 24/7 BUT WILL BE SOON![/b]
http://[b]Features:[/b] - HOME: Shops, Teleports and more - 738/742 Based - 20+ Different Bosses - Vesta, Statius, Dragon Claws, Spirit shields, PVP weapons, lucky weapons, 742/744 items - Good starting items/weapons & easy access to level - All Skills working (Maybe not 100%) - All Godwars Bosses - All Special Attacks - Flaming Helmets - 718+ Items [b]And LOTS More![/b]
Staff positions are open, apply for them on the forums! Don't just come for staff either... Begging for ranks will DECREASE your chance in getting them! Welcome to [b]RuneForbidden,[/b] here are some screenshots!
[b]Home:[/b] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/2zfppap.png[/img]
Some Teleports: [img]http://gyazo.com/9c552feb3e461bb9b74f19f38162bfe3.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/74df7bdf8ac6d056df7ed2cdf0eccb16.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/444f324d2985adb0ca40422cc5ffa0b7.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/e1060ed1998298c8476a2ac74ee72210.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/78e3abeeb7fd4fe3e29b4949c15e92f9.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/685c4d0551ae59b856714931f87c8d48.png[/img]
Some Shops: [img]http://gyazo.com/8a61d355cb57b31fb031a140d8a3296c.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/31ee851312f59947d2f4e77409fdfbab.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/88011795113bf3fd51e52cdf0a78fe89.png[/img]
Custom Systems: [img]http://gyazo.com/cc135e946f2cb70a2a5d2082455a634e.png[/img]
Some Bosses: [b]QBD & downstairs[/b] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/iogdbn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/1hqcea.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/22a1483d7b6686357b69cddc4b91c78b.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/bf4bc7fa282d3262654ca4231c37bb5b.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/iw4qi9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2dahf5t.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/24kwehz.png[/img]
Donator benefits, such as donator only potions, pets, donator store!
Custom pvp system & pvp shop
So what are you waiting for? Join [b]Today![/b][/center]
